short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension for pin ChatGPT chats

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
📌 ChatPin: Effortlessly Manage Your ChatGPT Conversations
ChatPin empowers you to pin 🔖, unpin 🚫, and search 🔍 your most important ChatGPT conversations. Stay organized and keep valuable insights at your fingertips! 🚀

✨ Features:
📍 Pin and unpin essential ChatGPT chats with ease.
🔍 Search through your pinned chats to find exactly what you need.
🖥️ Intuitive and user-friendly design for a seamless experience.

Make your ChatGPT experience smarter and more productive! 💡
